name: Factory Panic (Alex 'Tid' Knowles)
description:
In Factory Panic everything has spun out of control!

All of your robot's actions, like jumping and attacking, are out of your hands!

The deck of actions will shuffle and play your moves out for you, so you just need to focus on moving the robot left and right. 

Actions are drawn from the deck on the right and slide across the screen. Once they make it to the Execute Box, your robot will perform that action whether you're ready or not!

Defeat enough enemies to clear the level and proceed.

Between levels, choose between adding new Commands to your deck or upgrading your robot's maximum health.

Created for GMTK Game Jam 2020 -
